channel.title: Deployment on Submariner k8s project documentation website

item.title: subctl
item.description: subctl is a command line utility designed to simplify the deployment and maintenance of Submariner across your clusters. Synopsis subctl [command] [--flags] ... Description subctl helps to automate the deployment of the Submariner operator, thereby reducing the possibility of mistakes during the process. subctl connects to specified cluster(s) and performs the requested command. Commands deploy-broker subctl deploy-broker [flags] The deploy-broker command configures the cluster specified by the --kubeconfig flag (or KUBECONFIG env var) and the --kubecontext flag as the Broker.
